original: Engel, Erik Gösta Georg, verkställande direktör, Motala, f. 2/7/06 i Sthlm av disp. Georg E. o. Anna Wes-terlund. G. 26 m. Inez Tidstrand. Barn: Kerstin f. 27, Britta 31, Anna 38, Gunilla 41. — Stud:ex. 22, Schar-taus hand :inst., res:off:ex. 25. Uti. textilprakt. 24-26, start, agenturfirma Gösta Engel i Sthlm 26, verkst. dir. i Engelfabr. A-B, Motala Täckfabr. A-B o. Ostgöta Mattfabr. A-B sed. 39. RFinlVRO.
translated: Engel, Erik Gösta Georg, Chief Executive Officer, Motala, b. 2/7/06 in Stockholm to sales manager Georg E. and Anna Westerlund. Married on 26th to Inez Tidstrand. Children: Kerstin b. 27, Britta b. 31, Anna b. 38, Gunilla b. 41. Completed high school in 1922, studied at Schar-taus Business Institute, and passed the Reserve Officer Exam in 1925. Worked in textile practice from 1924-1926 and started the agency firm Gösta Engel in Stockholm in 1926. Became CEO of Engelfabr. A-B, Motala Täckfabr. A-B, and Ostgöta Mattfabr. A-B in 1939. Awarded RFinlVRO.
